greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: Product_{n>=1} (1 - Lucas(n)*x^n + (-x^2)^n) / (1 + Lucas(n)*x^n + (-x^2)^n) where Lucas(n) = A000204(n).
comment: Compare to: Product_{n>=1} (1-q^n)/(1+q^n) = 1 + 2*Sum_{n>=1} (-1)^n*q^(n^2), the Jacobi theta_4 function, which has the g.f: exp( Sum_{n>=1} -(sigma(2*n)-sigma(n)) * q^n/n ).
link: Paul D. Hanna, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: a(n) = 0 iff n is not the sum of 2 squares (A022544).
G.f.: exp( Sum_{n>=1} -(sigma(2*n)-sigma(n)) * Lucas(n) * x^n/n ) where Lucas(n) = A000204(n).
example: Compare to the logarithm of Jacobi theta4 H(x) = 1 + 2*Sum_{n>=1} (-1)^n*x^(n^2):
which are numbers that are not the sum of 2 squares.
program: (PARI) /* Subroutine used in PARI programs below: */
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jan 07 2012
